item.title: API Design Best Practices
item.description: I had done presentation wihin the API development team in my work place on "{API} Design Best Practices" while creating the APIs that is consumed by the clients. The main purpose of this presentation was to bring ease and smoothness in API development and implementation. I have shared the slide in slideshare.net.
